caption.p: Catalytic Effect of Cobalt Components in the Deposition Process of Active Mn Compound
(A) Comparison of CVs (0.1 mV s −1) of coin-type batteries using δ-MnO 2 cathodes with or without cobalt modification.
(B) Comparison of LSV profiles (positive sweep, 1 mV s −1) of stainless steel (SS) and SS covered with pre-electrodeposited Co(OH) 2.
(C and D) (C) Mn 2p 3/2 XPS profiles and (D) digital photographs of the samples after the LSV positive sweep to specific potentials.
(E) First two CV cycles (1 mV s −1) of SS with pre-electrodeposited Co(OH) 2.
(F) Illustration of mechanism of the catalysis effect via Mn self-catalysis (Route 1) and via cobalt-induced catalysis (Route 2).
Note that results in (B–E) are obtained based on a home-made electrochemical cell (See Figure S9A).
